title: README Factory
description: A README generater application where users can select sections, customize content, see a live preview, and copy or download the final Markdown file for their project

title: Food Filter
description: A scanner app that lets users scan food barcodes to check if the product meets their dietary restrictions and identify any ingredients that don't align

title: PlantPal
description: A plant assistant app designed to help everyone from beginners to plant enthusiasts manage and care for their plants effectively
